item.title: Multiple broken qnd uneven paving slabs causing trip and fall hazardhazard, 18th October
item.description:
Pls see photos. Multiple trip hazards caused by house building and refurbishment work. Particularly hazardous after dark. Also query whether position of [portable loo] on a public pavement is allowed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Parkwood Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Car left from old neighbours, 18th October
item.description:
Neighbours have moved out we have had problems with them the old house they lived in is now voided and metal up at there windows and door. He has left the car on our drive and refusing to take it we have been battling for this car to be taken my housing have left a notice warning on the car and it’s still not been taken we need this car gone it’s giving him reasons to come back and it’s not fair on all of our neighbours we want to put our car there
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canon Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
